carrier.name: Admiral
carrier.description: Grants x1.5 Speed, -1 Weapons, -2 Hyperspace Range to the Carrier.

carrier.name: Lieutenant
carrier.description: Grants +1 Weapons, -1 Hyperspace Range to the Carrier.

carrier.name: Colonel
carrier.description: Grants +2 Weapons, -1 Hyperspace Range, x0.75 Speed to the Carrier.

carrier.name: General
carrier.description: Grants +3 Weapons, -1 Hyperspace Range, x0.5 Speed to the Carrier.

carrier.name: Smuggler
carrier.description: Grants x2 Speed, -3 Hyperspace Range to the Carrier.

carrier.name: Explorer
carrier.description: Grants +3 Hyperspace Range, -3 Weapons to the Carrier.

carrier.name: Destroyer
carrier.description: Grants +5 Weapons, -3 Hyperspace Range, x0.5 Speed to the Carrier.

carrier.name: Scrambler
carrier.description: Prevents other players from seeing how many ships the Carrier has.

carrier.name: Infiltrator
carrier.description: When participating in combat, the enemy fights with -1 Weapons.

carrier.name: Warp Stablizer
carrier.description: Warp Scramblers do not affect the carrier.

star.name: Orbital Array
star.description: Grants +1 Scanning Range, -1 Manufacturing to the Star.

star.name: Space Dock
star.description: Grants +1 Manufacturing, -1 Terraforming to the Star.

star.name: Atmosphere Processor
star.description: Grants +1 Terraforming, -1 Scanning to the Star.

star.name: Orbital Cannon
star.description: Grants +2 Weapons, -1 Scanning, -1 Terraforming to the Star.

star.name: Warp Scrambler
star.description: Locks the Warp Gate at the Star to prevent other players from using it.

star.name: World Builder
star.description: Adds 1 to the Star's natural resources every tick, +1 Terraforming, -3 Scanning, -3 Weapons.

star.name: War Machine
star.description: Deducts 1 from the Star's natural resources every tick, +3 Manufacturing, +1 Weapons, -1 Terraforming. This specialist retires if the star reaches 0 natural resources.

star.name: Scrambler
star.description: Prevents other players from seeing how many ships are garrisoned at the Star.
